title: Can I send money to a Non Verified Basic GCash user
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)
- [Can I send money to a Non-Verified/Basic GCash user?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40187967451545-Can-I-send-money-to-a-Non-Verified-Basic-GCash-user)
- [How can I send money in GCash via QR code?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005327223-How-can-I-send-money-in-GCash-via-QR-code)
- [How do I generate my personal GCash QR?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30379236648601-How-do-I-generate-my-personal-GCash-QR)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

**YES**, you can send money to a Non-Verified or Basic GCash user if you are [Fully Verified.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393)

You will be seeing a **prompt indicating that you are sending to a Non-Verified GCash user**.

Note that Non-Verified or Basic GCash users cannot Send Money to other accounts. For the best experience, we recommend getting [Fully Verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account).

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [GCash Features for Basic vs Fully Verified Accounts](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19576345096217)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614)
- [How can I send money in GCash via QR code?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005327223)
- [Can I send money to a non-GCash user?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006976943)
